overview: Talks On A Happening Called Life  "Are you happy in life?" asks Ramesh. "If your answer is yes â€“ no problem, but if your answer is no, I can tell you my secret!"  This DVD is a summary of Ramesh Balsekar's talks on his basic concept, with visitors from all over the world. Filmed during the morning Satsangs at his residence in the latter half of 2004, Ramesh explains how to live a happy and harmonious life. In a clear and easily understandable way he covers subjects like 'guilt, shame and sin', 'ego' and 'free will'. He also talks about what the daily life of an enlightened sage is like and tells the story of his own enlightenment.
